name: Chronicles of a Shadow
description:
Meet Lumus, a shadow who has unfortunately been separated from its body. 

The goal for every level is pretty simple: find and reach the exit... but there's a twist: as a shadow, you cannot enter dark areas, as those are like solid walls for you! You will need to find other ways to navigate through the levels.

This game was made as a school project at UQAC, and is therefore only a prototype. This is why there are only two playable levels.
